directions: Whisk together the limeade concentrate, milk, tequila, and triple sec in a bowl. Fold in the whipped topping, and pour into the prepared pie crust. Freeze until firm, at least 2 hours.
ingredients: 1/2 (12 ounce) can frozen limeade concentrate, thawed
1/2 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Margarita Pie II
